description.value:
Activate 2 (manipulate)

This bottle is packed with dirt, though the shrunken corpse of an ankhrav hive mother is buried within. When you open the bottle, the effigy of a Huge ankhrav hive mother emerges, burrows up to 20 feet, and then erupts from the ground spraying acid, creating a @Template[square|distance:15]{15-foot-by-15-foot} pit that's 10 feet deep. Creatures standing in this area take @Damage[6d6[acid],1d6[persistent,acid]]{6d6 acid damage and 1d6 persistent acid damage} (@Check[reflex|dc:24|basic] save). A success or critical success means the creature also leaps to safety, landing in the nearest space adjacent to the pit. A failure or critical failure means the creature falls into the pit. Climbing out of the pit requires a successful @Check[athletics|dc:22] check.

Craft Requirements Supply the corpse of an ankhrav hive mother.
